name: Messy Nessie
description:
Brackeys Game Jam Submission 2022 "IT IS NOT REAL"

Play as Nessie and get your grub on, but watch out! Tourists and Divers are lurking around your lake and are ready to reveal that you exist. Use WASD to swim around and get food, then swim to your computer and use the MOUSE to gaslight Tourists on Twitter. You must maintain the illusion that you are not real to survive.
